label: Entertainment and Media
description: Search queries related to entertainment and media, including movies, TV shows, books, and games.
intents: Find information about a specific movie, TV show, book, or game.
Purchase or rent a movie, TV show, book, or game.
Find merchandise related to a specific movie, TV show, book, or game.
Find reviews or ratings for a specific movie, TV show, book, or game.
Find information about upcoming movies, TV shows, books, or games.

subcategories.label: TV Shows
subcategories.description: Search queries related to TV shows.

subcategories.label: Trailers
subcategories.description: Search queries related to movie and game trailers.
